abstract: The N.F.L. sent a letter to the union saying that on Monday it was prepared to start collecting blood, which would be held until the final details of a testing plan were worked out. The union's response was: No, not yet
snippet: The N.F.L. sent a letter to the union saying that on Monday it was prepared to start collecting blood, which would be held until the final details of a testing plan were worked out. The union's response was: No, not yet

headline.main: Stalemate Remains on Collecting Blood Samples for H.G.H. Testing
